title: How to Play a Match of Clash in Destiny

steps.headline: Set a course for the Crucible.
steps.description: Choose Clash, and press and hold 'Y/Triangle' to launch.

steps.headline: Wait a minute or two.
steps.description: The system will have to evaluate you and your fellow Guardians to decide how to split you up. Once your team is decided, you will launch.

steps.headline: Once you arrive at the map, inspect your team.
steps.description: The player with the highest Crucible Reputation will act as the Alpha of the team.

steps.headline: Go.
steps.description: Either spread out, or stick with your teammates. Choose a gun, and be prepared to deck someone.

steps.headline: Shoot to kill.
steps.description: If you are a Titan or Warlock, unleash your rage. If you are a Hunter, wait quietly for your prey. Assassinate them with a single blow as they pass by.

steps.headline: Learn the maps.
steps.description: Once you are experienced, you can set up a strategy to defend or attack.

steps.headline: Play until the time is up.
steps.description: The team with the highest score is the winner.

steps.headline: Once the match is over, continue playing, or press and hold 'Y/Triangle' to leave.

text: Set a course for the Crucible. Choose Clash, and press and hold 'Y/Triangle' to launch. Wait a minute or two. The system will have to evaluate you and your fellow Guardians to decide how to split you up. Once your team is decided, you will launch. Once you arrive at the map, inspect your team. The player with the highest Crucible Reputation will act as the Alpha of the team. Go. Either spread out, or stick with your teammates. Choose a gun, and be prepared to deck someone. Shoot to kill. If you are a Titan or Warlock, unleash your rage. If you are a Hunter, wait quietly for your prey. Assassinate them with a single blow as they pass by. Learn the maps. Once you are experienced, you can set up a strategy to defend or attack. Play until the time is up. The team with the highest score is the winner. Once the match is over, continue playing, or press and hold 'Y/Triangle' to leave.
